education.institution: Northwestern University – Kellogg School of Management

work_habits.communication_style: Async‑first, with brief synchronous syncs when needed
work_habits.meeting_preferences: Limits to 2–3 meetings per day, prefers video with agenda, blocks out focus time
work_habits.work_environment: Hybrid (3 days in office, 2 days remote)

personality.risk_tolerance: Moderate – comfortable with calculated HR initiatives
personality.stress_management_approach: Daily morning run, mindfulness meditation, scheduled breaks
personality.conflict_resolution_style: Collaborative problem‑solving, aims for win‑win outcomes

availability.travel_flexibility: Up to 25% travel (1–2 weeks per quarter) for HR conferences and site visits

personal_factors.commute_situation: 20‑minute drive to Austin office; hybrid schedule reduces commuting load
personal_factors.health_considerations: Mild seasonal allergies; attends gym 3 times/week
personal_factors.career_motivation: Aspires to HR Director role, focusing on strategic workforce planning and expanding DEI impact

collaboration.meeting_frequency_preference: 2–3 short meetings per day (max 30 min each)
collaboration.feedback_style: Direct yet empathetic; focuses on behavior and outcomes
collaboration.knowledge_sharing_habits: Writes concise summary docs, hosts monthly brown‑bag sessions, contributes to internal wiki

potential_bottlenecks: Primary owner of DEI reporting – limited backup
High dependency on Angela for HR analytics dashboards
burnout_risk_factors: Tight project deadlines combined with meeting load
